mapper.select: select * from data_operation where model_id = #{modelId} and code = #{code} and status != 0
select * from data_operation where model_id = #{modelId} and status != 0 order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into data_operation (model_id, code, name, en_name, description, status,create_time, update_time) values (#{modelId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY update status=#{status},name=#{name}, description=#{description},update_time = now()
